ValidationRule.description: If “Contacting on Behalf of” is required in order to close a case where 3PL is checked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') && ISCHANGED(Status) && NOT(ISBLANK(NS_Logo_3PL_Account__c)) && ISBLANK(NS_Contacting_on_Behalf_of__c)&& (NS_RecordTypeName__c !='3PL Tracing'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='AccessNS/Inventory Management'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Cash Hold'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Dimensional/Locomotive'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Equipment Allocation'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Expedite/Special Train'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Holiday Polling'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Overload/Imbalance'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Pipeline Management'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Refrigerated Equipment'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='TOP21'&& NS_RecordTypeName__c !='Transportation' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete "Contacting on Behalf of" prior to closing the Case.
